title: 求计分板如何设置杀人数与被杀人数，在线等！
author: 寿司
txt_content:
RT！
谁知道，求解决！
各位大神来教我吧！

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add kill playerKillCount KillCount
/scoreboard objectives add death deathCount DeathCount
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar kill
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar death复制代码
计分板

replies.author: 寿司
replies.txt_content:
Lucky777777 发表于 2015-12-31 09:20
计分板
